title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
OB: Currently, when a table report item is added without setting the data set, the group dialog does not appear.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set for the table report item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table report item. 
2. Do not set the data set for the table report item. 
3. Try creating a new table group. The group dialog should appear, even without a dataset.
